Package org.attribyte.snook.auth

Class TokenAuthenticator<T>

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.auth.HeaderAuthenticator<T>
org.attribyte.snook.auth.BearerAuthenticator<T>
org.attribyte.snook.auth.TokenAuthenticator<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Authenticator<T>
public abstract class TokenAuthenticator<T> extends BearerAuthenticator<T>
Authenticator where a token is the value of a cookie (with no scheme, unlike 'Bearer').
